entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 09:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: E 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
